James Rolfe's Animation Creations

Release date:
January 1, 1993

James's old star rating:

★★★☆☆

"fairly good."

James's old number rating:

9/10

Bitchute Archive:

Archive.org Archive:

Old site description:

I took some Saturday animation classes at the University of the Arts and made a series of cut-out cartoons which featured people fleeing from dinosaurs, knights sword-fighting through castles and castaways exploring dangerous jungles. Though they’re rushed and choppy-looking, they’re fun to watch.

James's old ratings:

Back in 2003 James included star ratings with each film he listed on his filmography on his website.

Later on he switched to ratings out of ten.

Eventually, he dropped the ratings entirely.

This archive is unoffical and run by a fan of Cinemassacre. Contact the Archivist
